verbose_text: To investigate whether the effects of IDH1 R132H in this context are mediated by 2-HG, N : : TVA; Cdkn2a lox / lox; Atrx lox / lox;P ten lox / lox astrocytes expressing Cre alone or Cre and PDGFA were suspended in soft agar and treated with vehicle (DMSO) or a cell membrane-permeable [trifluoromethyl benzyl (TFMB)-esterified] version of (R)-2HG.
